content:
Numbers are too hard for me, but!
Overcoming challenges is essential for any researcher!
I'll start by figuring out my housing fees.

If I save 10 Loomi per day,
in 100 days I'll save... ten thousand Loomi?!
Maybe rent isn't that expensive after all.

Three hundred, four hundred, six hundred, eight hundred, seven hundred...
Oh, I'm just calculating how much savings I have left,
after all, rent isn't exactly pocket change.

Last night while interpreting the starry sky, I realized...
(squinting) Rent isn't just a bunch of numbers,
it's also a guide to life, how mysterious yeep~
Hmm, did I count to four hundred or eight hundred just now?
